tooltip.dreadsteel.cosmetic_kit: §7消耗以染色当前所有装备和持有的悚怖钢物品§r
tooltip.dreadsteel.dreadsteel_ingot: §7You hear whispers coming from the flames§r
tooltip.dreadsteel.dreadsteel_scythe: §7While Attacking: Summon a magical spinning blade, piercing all enemies and armor on hit§r
tooltip.dreadsteel.dreadsteel_setbonus: §7Full Set: Immunity to damage from Fire, Spikes and Lightning§r
tooltip.dreadsteel.dreadsteel_shield: §7While Blocking: Incinerates all projectiles and burns melee attackers§r
